summary: This is an email from a HuffPost reporter inquiring about whether Britain's Prince Andrew will submit to questioning by U.S. investigators regarding Jeffrey Epstein's potential co-conspirators, referencing a Telegraph report.

persons.name: Sara Boboltz
persons.context: HuffPost reporter who sent the email inquiring about Prince Andrew's potential cooperation with U.S. investigators.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Subject of inquiry regarding whether he will submit to questioning by U.S. investigators about Jeffrey Epstein's potential co-conspirators.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Deceased financier whose potential co-conspirators are under investigation by U.S. authorities.

connections.description: Prince Andrew is being sought for questioning regarding Epstein's potential co-conspirators, indicating an association between them.

events.title: Inquiry about Prince Andrew's cooperation
events.description: HuffPost reporter inquires whether Prince Andrew will submit to questioning by U.S. investigators regarding Epstein's potential co-conspirators.

keyFacts: A HuffPost reporter inquired about whether Prince Andrew would submit to questioning by U.S. investigators regarding Jeffrey Epstein's potential co-conspirators.
The inquiry references a Telegraph report claiming Prince Andrew was preparing to be questioned.
The email demonstrates media interest in Prince Andrew's potential involvement with Epstein associates in November 2019.
